```{r}
library(tidyverse)

registration <- read_csv("Registration.csv", skip = 1, 
                         col_names = c("time", "email", "name", "pronouns", "institution", "status", "R_proficiency", "tidyverse_experience", "markdown_experience", "data", "use_R", "expectations")) %>% 
  mutate(status = as_factor(tolower(status)),
         tidyverse_experience = as_factor(tidyverse_experience),
         markdown_experience = as_factor(markdown_experience),
         data = as_factor(data))
```

## General information
```{r}
registration %>% 
  count(status) %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = reorder(status, n), y = n) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = NULL, title = "Participant status")
```

## R proficiency
```{r}
registration %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = R_proficiency) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = NULL, title = "R proficiency level")
```

## Tidyverse and Markdown experience
```{r}
registration %>% 
  mutate(tidyverse_experience = relevel(tidyverse_experience, ref = "No, I am new to R")) %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = tidyverse_experience) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = NULL, title = "Experience with tidyverse")

registration %>% 
  mutate(markdown_experience = relevel(markdown_experience, ref = "No, I don't use R-Markdown")) %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = markdown_experience) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = NULL, title = "Experience with Markdown")
```


## Data
```{r}
registration %>% 
  count(data) %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = reorder(data, n), y = n) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, title = "Data participants (intend to) use")
```
